pageContent: Objective: To examine the relationship of 'symptom flare' with sexual function and lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) before brachytherapy, as we noted that after brachytherapy for prostate cancer, some patients had recurrent LUTS after an asymptomatic period; this secondary exacerbation of symptoms ('symptom flare') occurred at approximately 2 years after implantation and was transient in most patients.

metaData.source:
Arousal Incontinence in Men Following Radical Prostatectomy: Prevalence, Impact and Predictors
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31735611/
